Locale.Value:
Add: MSI Builder can now include Windows PowerShell and PowerShell 7 modules with your installer.
Add: New property called SetProgressBarColors to ProgressBarOverlay control to set progress bar color using the ForeColor and BackColor properties.
Upd: Minor changes to Module.psd1 file template
Upd: Changed module export location for module projects. Now includes module version in build path to match paths for modules installed by PowerShellGet.
Fix: SAPIENCommandline tool exiting immediately at launch
Fix: Resolving dot sourced files during packaging can fail for ANSI encoded files without message.
Fix: Other minor changes and fixes.
